title: Schneider Electric to Attend Monday October 19 White House Summit on Climate and the Road ...
text: ANDOVER, Mass.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Schneider Electric, the global specialist in energy management and automation, announced it will attend Mondayâ€™s White House Summit on Climate and the Road through Paris. The convening will gather leaders from the government, private sector, academic, technical and scientific communities to focus on cross-sector efforts to tackle the climate change challenge here in the United States, as well as on a global scale.
